task_summary: Place down the blue Pepsi can onto the table surface, then retreat.

task_long_description.overview: A UR-style manipulator operates over a cluttered tabletop with several bottles and cans (blue Pepsi can, red can, green bottle, tall red bottle, orange stack, small gray box). The goal is to gently place the Pepsi can on the table, aligned and stable, and then back off safely. The behavior first verifies the can is held, approaches a safe above-table pose, lowers until contact with low force, releases the gripper, waits briefly for stabilization, and retreats to clear the scene.
preconditions: Robot has the Pepsi can in the gripper
Table surface is clear at the chosen placement area
Perception frame is valid and kinematics reachable
stepwise_plan: Verify the can is currently in the gripper.
Move to a pose above the placement area on the table with small vertical offset.
Lower slowly until contact is detected with low force.
Open the gripper to release the can.
Wait briefly to let the can settle.
Retreat a short distance to clear the object.
success_criteria: Pepsi can ends upright and stationary on the table
Gripper releases cleanly and robot retreats to a safe distance
failure_and_recovery: If object not in gripper: abort and request re-pick in upstream pipeline
If contact not detected in max depth: retreat and retry approach
If release slips the can: re-grasp if safe or signal operator
task_long_description.termination: Terminate after retreat once the can is placed and the manipulator is clear of the object.

frame_3.now_evidence: arm aligned above left-side placement area; stable pre-place posture visible
frame_3.predicts_next: descent for contact and release expected next

node_specs.description: Verify the robot is currently holding the Pepsi can.
Move to a pose above the intended table placement point.
Descend slowly until contact is detected with low force.
Release the can by opening the gripper.
Allow the can to settle after release.
Back away from the placed can to a safe distance.

failure_modes: No contact sensed within max depth
Collision with nearby items during approach/retreat
recovery_strategy: Increase wait or adjust contact threshold
assumptions: Blue Pepsi can is the leftmost blue can visible; the gripper already holds it per the instruction.
Frames appear to show approach near left area; grasp state not perfectly visible, treated as pre-held object.

expected_success_criteria: Can upright and stable on table
